/*# sourceMappingURL=data:application/json;base64, */</style><style>.addi-home-banner-default {
    display: flex;
    flex-direction: column;
    justify-content: center;
    padding: 30px;
    min-height: 240px;
    background-color: var(--color-addi-comp-five-base);
}

.addi-home-banner-default-content-container{
    display: flex;
    flex-direction: column;
    justify-content: center;
}

.addi-home-banner-default-content-container__title {
    font-family: 'Malory-bold', 'system-ui';
    font-weight: 700;
    font-size:  32px;
    line-height: 35px;
    text-align: center;
    margin: 0 0 15px;
    color: var(--color-addi-gray-lighten4);
}

.addi-home-banner-default-content-container__logo {
    width: 2em;
}

.addi-home-banner-content-container__button--outline {
    font-family: 'Mallory', 'system-ui';
    font-weight: 700;
    font-size: 14px;
    line-height: 14px;
    display: flex;
    background-color: var(--color-addi-primary-active);
    border-radius: 25px;
    border: 1px solid var(--color-addi-font-over-dark);
    color: var(--color-addi-font-over-dark);
    justify-content: center;
    padding: 9px 0 10px;
    cursor: pointer;
}

@media screen and (min-width: 600px) {
    .addi-home-banner-default {
        padding: 20px;
        min-height: 76px;
    }

    .addi-home-banner-default-content-container{
        flex-direction: row;
        justify-content: space-between;
        align-items: center;
    }

    .addi-home-banner-default-content-container__title {    
        display:flex;
        align-items: center;
        font-size:  20px;
        line-height: 24px;
        text-align: initial;
        margin: 0;
    }

    .addi-home-banner-default-content-container__logo {
        width: 3em;
        margin-top: 1px;
    }

    .addi-home-banner-content-container__button--outline {
        width: 130px;
        padding: 7px 0 8px;
    }
}

        padding: 30px;
        min-height: 120px;
    }

        font-size:  32px;
        line-height: 35px;
    }

    .addi-home-banner-default-content-container__logo {
        margin-top: 2px;

    }

 * ADDI - UI-Foundation
 * Do not edit directly
 * Generated on Wed, 22 Dec 2021 13:04:33 GMT
 */

:root {
  --color-addi-primary-active: rgb(60, 106, 240);
  --color-addi-primary-hover: rgb(10, 57, 196);
  --color-addi-primary-inactive: rgb(204, 221, 255);
  --color-addi-feedback-success: rgb(0, 190, 122);
  --color-addi-feedback-warning: rgb(239, 200, 0);
  --color-addi-feedback-error: rgb(250, 77, 75);
  --color-addi-feedback-info: rgb(133, 169, 255);
  --color-addi-font-primary: rgb(24, 24, 31);
  --color-addi-font-secondary: rgb(77, 82, 92);
  --color-addi-font-strong: rgb(116, 119, 122);
  --color-addi-font-hint: rgb(201, 205, 209);
  --color-addi-font-disable: rgb(235, 236, 237);
  --color-addi-font-over-dark: rgb(255, 255, 255);
  --color-addi-font-action: rgb(60, 106, 240);
  --color-addi-font-success: rgb(1, 128, 82);
  --color-addi-font-error: rgb(204, 31, 31);
  --color-addi-background-white: rgb(255, 255, 255);
  --color-addi-background-soft: rgb(250, 250, 250);
  --color-addi-background-medium: rgb(235, 236, 237);
  --color-addi-background-hint: rgb(201, 205, 209);
  --color-addi-background-strong: rgb(116, 119, 122);
  --color-addi-comp-one-lighten4: rgb(250, 229, 255);
  --color-addi-comp-one-lighten3: rgb(247, 214, 255);
  --color-addi-comp-one-lighten2: rgb(236, 193, 247);
  --color-addi-comp-one-lighten1: rgb(221, 169, 235);
  --color-addi-comp-one-base: rgb(195, 143, 208);
  --color-addi-comp-one-darken1: rgb(168, 113, 189);
  --color-addi-comp-one-darken2: rgb(139, 90, 163);
  --color-addi-comp-one-darken3: rgb(105, 58, 132);
  --color-addi-comp-one-darken4: rgb(70, 34, 102);
  --color-addi-comp-one-darken5: rgb(41, 10, 76);
  --color-addi-comp-two-lighten5: rgb(255, 253, 235);
  --color-addi-comp-two-lighten4: rgb(255, 251, 214);
  --color-addi-comp-two-lighten3: rgb(255, 245, 173);
  --color-addi-comp-two-lighten2: rgb(255, 239, 138);
  --color-addi-comp-two-lighten1: rgb(250, 223, 70);
  --color-addi-comp-two-base: rgb(239, 200, 0);
  --color-addi-comp-two-darken1: rgb(227, 185, 0);
  --color-addi-comp-two-darken2: rgb(184, 141, 0);
  --color-addi-comp-two-darken3: rgb(133, 99, 7);
  --color-addi-comp-two-darken4: rgb(92, 63, 6);
  --color-addi-comp-three-lighten5: rgb(235, 255, 239);
  --color-addi-comp-three-lighten4: rgb(212, 252, 231);

/*# sourceMappingURL=data:application/json;base64, */</style><style>addi-onboarding {
    position: fixed;
    display: none;
    height: 500px;
    width: 100%;
    min-width: 360px;
    flex-direction: column;
    font-family: 'Barlow',sans-serif;
    font-size: 13px;
    z-index: 9999;
}

addi-onboarding .addi-modal_overlay {
    position: fixed !important;
    top: 0;
    left: 0;
    right: 0;
    bottom: 0;
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
    background-color: rgba(0,0,0,0.5);
    z-index: 1;
    cursor: pointer;
    display: inherit;
}

addi-onboarding .addi-modal {
    position: fixed;
    display: flex;
    flex-direction: column;
    height: fit-content;
    padding: 25px 0;
    border-radius: 20px;
    opacity: 1;
    top: 50%;
    left: 50%;
    transform: translate(-50%, -50%);
    -webkit-box-shadow: 2px 1px 8px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0.2);
    -moz-box-shadow: 2px 1px 8px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0.2);
    box-shadow: 2px 1px 8px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0.2);
}

    width: 360px;
}

addi-onboarding .addi-modal--wide {
    width: 400px;
}

    border: none;
    width: 100%;
    height: 570px;
    overflow: hidden;
}

    width: 100%;
    height: fit-content;
    padding-right: 22px;
    display: flex;
    flex-direction: row-reverse;
    box-sizing: border-box;
}

    background-color: #ffffff !important;
    border-radius: 50% !important;
    border: none;
    cursor: pointer;
    padding: 0;
    height: 24px;
    display: contents;
}

    width: 24px;
    user-select: none;
    -moz-user-select: none;
    -webkit-user-drag: none;
    -webkit-user-select: none;
    -ms-user-select: none;
}

    background: url('https://s3.amazonaws.com/statics.addi.com/widget/addi-loader.svg') center center no-repeat;
    background-size: 100px;
}

    width: 100%;

    z-index: 9999;
}

    top: 0;
    left: 0;
    right: 0;
    bottom: 0;
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;

    z-index: 1;
    cursor: pointer;
    display: inherit;
}

    position: fixed;
    display: flex;
    flex-direction: column;
    height: fit-content;
    padding: 25px 0;
    border-radius: 20px;
    opacity: 1;
    top: 50%;
    left: 50%;

    width: 400px;

    border: none;
    width: 100%;
    height: 570px;
    overflow: hidden;
}

    width: 100%;
    height: fit-content;
    display: inline-block;
    flex-direction: row;
}

    background-color: #ffffff;
    border-radius: 50%;
    border: none;
    cursor: pointer;
    float: right;
    margin-right: 22px;
    padding: 0;
    height: 24px;
}

    width: 24px !important;
    user-select: none;
    -moz-user-select: none;
    -webkit-user-drag: none;
    -webkit-user-select: none;
    -ms-user-select: none;
    max-width: 24px !important;
}

/*# sourceMappingURL=data:application/json;base64, */</style><style>.addi-one-click-checkout {
    display: none;
}

    display: inline-block;
    margin-bottom: 10px;
}

.addi-one-click-checkout .addi-one-click-checkout__button {
    outline: none;
    cursor: pointer;
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
    border: 0;
    background-color: var(--color-addi-primary-active);
    color: var(--color-addi-background-white);
    width: 100%;
    padding: 19px;
    font-family: 'Mallory', 'system-ui';
    font-style: normal;
    font-weight: 700;
    font-size: 16px;
}

.addi-one-click-checkout .addi-one-click-checkout__button:disabled {
    background-color: var(--color-addi-background-medium);
    cursor: default;
}

.addi-one-click-checkout .addi-one-click-checkout__button-logo {
    height: 16px;
    margin-left: 6px;
}

.addi-checkout-frame {
    position: fixed;
    display: flex;
    top: 0;
    bottom: 0;
    left: 0;
    right: 0;
    background-color: rgba(38, 38, 46, 0.6);
    z-index: 2147483647;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
}

.addi-checkout-frame__content {
    max-width: 100vw;
    max-height: 100vh;
    height: 700px;
    width: 420px;
    border: 0;
    background-color: var(--color-addi-background-white);
}

    </div>--><div class="wrapper-phones"><div class="phones"><h2 class="title">Siempre dispuestos a ayudarte</h2><div class="phonesColumn"><div class="column cols-3"><span class="icon-phone"></span><h3 class="subtitle">Servicio técnico Haceb</h3><p class="outsanding-phone">¡Llama ahora!<a href="tel:#466">#466</a></p><p><strong>Medellín:</strong><a href="tel:6042552100">(604)2552100</a></p><p><strong>Bogotá:</strong><a href="tel:6014897979">(601)4897979</a></p><p><strong>Barranquilla:</strong><a href="tel:6053110000">(605) 3110000</a></p><p><strong>Línea nacional gratuita:</strong><a href="tel:018000511000">018000511000</a></p><p></p></div><div class="column cols-3"><span class="icon-wh"></span><h3 class="subtitle">Línea WhatsApp</h3><p class="whatsapp-phone"><a href="https://api.whatsapp.com/send?phone=573164539797" target="_blank"><span class="icon-linea-wh"></span><span class="text-phone">Encuéntranos solo a un clic <br><b>+57 3164539797</b></span></a></p><p>Estamos disponibles de lunes a viernes de 7am a 8pm y sábados de 8am a 6pm.                         fuera de este horario, te contestaremos tan pronto estemos de regreso</p></div><div class="column cols-3"><span class="icon-garantia"></span><h3 class="subtitle">Garantía <script type="text/javascript" id="">try{for(var dataProd=[],price=void 0,id=void 0,variant=void 0,position=void 0,name=void 0,elemento=document.getElementsByClassName("vitrineCategory")[0].getElementsByClassName("shelve__item"),num=document.getElementsByClassName("shelve__item").length,i=0;i<num;i++){var objData={};variant="Variant"+i;position=i;name=elemento[i].dataset.name;id=elemento[i].dataset.sku;var numprice=elemento[i].getElementsByClassName("shelve-prices")[0].getElementsByClassName("shelve-best-price")[0].dataset.bestprice.split(".").length;
price=3==numprice?elemento[i].getElementsByClassName("shelve-prices")[0].getElementsByClassName("shelve-best-price")[0].dataset.bestprice.split("$")[1].split(",")[0].split(".")[0]+elemento[i].getElementsByClassName("shelve-prices")[0].getElementsByClassName("shelve-best-price")[0].dataset.bestprice.split("$")[1].split(",")[0].split(".")[1]+elemento[i].getElementsByClassName("shelve-prices")[0].getElementsByClassName("shelve-best-price")[0].dataset.bestprice.split("$")[1].split(",")[0].split(".")[2]:
elemento[i].getElementsByClassName("shelve-prices")[0].getElementsByClassName("shelve-best-price")[0].dataset.bestprice.split("$")[1].split(",")[0].split(".")[0]+elemento[i].getElementsByClassName("shelve-prices")[0].getElementsByClassName("shelve-best-price")[0].dataset.bestprice.split("$")[1].split(",")[0].split(".")[1];var list=google_tag_manager["GTM-KNJJQGJ"].macro(10),brand="Haceb",category=google_tag_manager["GTM-KNJJQGJ"].macro(11);objData.id=id;objData.name=name;objData.price=price;objData.brand=brand;objData.category=category;objData.variant=
variant;objData.position=position;objData.list=list;dataProd.push(objData)}dataLayer.push({event:"BSproductImpression",ecommerce:{currencyCode:"COP",impressions:dataProd}})}catch(a){console.log("Error console "+a)};</script><script type="text/javascript" id="">function navigateBtnTop(){118<window.pageYOffset?document.querySelectorAll(".additional-login-links")[0].classList.add("sticky-links"):document.querySelectorAll(".additional-login-links")[0].classList.remove("sticky-links")}function eventFire(a,c){if(a.fireEvent)a.fireEvent("on"+c);else{var b=document.createEvent("Events");b.initEvent(c,!0,!1);a.dispatchEvent(b)}}
$.ajax({url:"/no-cache/profileSystem/getProfile",method:"get"}).then(function(a){if($(".link-account-item__text")[1].innerHTML="Mi perfil",a.IsUserDefined)localStorage.isUserRegistered?console.log("."):localStorage.isUserRegistered=!0,document.querySelectorAll(".link-account-item")[1].querySelector("a").setAttribute("href","/account");else{document.querySelectorAll(".link-account-item")[1].querySelector("a").setAttribute("href","#");a=document.querySelectorAll(".link-account-item")[1];var c="\x3cdiv class\x3d'additional-login-links'\x3e\x3ca href\x3d'#' class\x3d'cdc-fire cdc-login'\x3eIngresar\x3c/a\x3e\x3ca href\x3d'#' class\x3d'cdc-fire cdc-register'\x3eRegistrarte\x3c/a\x3e\x3c/div\x3e";
a.insertAdjacentHTML("beforeend",c);window.onscroll=function(){navigateBtnTop()};$(".cdc-register").click(function(b){sessionStorage.setItem("screenloaded","register");b.preventDefault();vtexid.start({returnUrl:"/account"});setTimeout(function(){$(".modal-header").find("[data-i18n]").html("Confirma tu identidad para ingresar o registrarte a nuestra tienda virtual.")},1E3)});$(".cdc-login").click(function(b){sessionStorage.setItem("screenloaded","login");b.preventDefault();vtexid.start({returnUrl:"/account"});
setTimeout(function(){$(".modal-header").find("[data-i18n]").html("Confirma tu identidad para ingresar o registrarte a nuestra tienda virtual.")},1E3)})}});</script><style>.link-account-user{position:relative;display:block}.header .promesasTop.slick-slider{background-color:#bed02e}.link-account-user:hover .additional-login-links{display:block}.link-account-user .additional-login-links{display:none;position:absolute;width:100%;top:59px;left:0;z-index:99;background-color:#f4f4f4}@media screen and (max-width:768px){.link-account-user .additional-login-links{width:calc(100% + 33px);top:51px}}.sticky-links{top:43px!important;padding:0 11px}.link-account-user .additional-login-links a{display:block;text-decoration:underline;color:#606060;padding:5px 0}.link-account-user .additional-login-links a:hover{color:#bed02e}.ajax-content-loader{display:none}.vtexIdUI-show-app{box-shadow:none;border:none}.vtexIdUI-show-app ul.vtexIdUI-providers-list .vtexIdUI-others-send-email,.vtexIdUI-show-app ul.vtexIdUI-providers-list .vtexIdUI-send-email{display:none}.vtexIdUI-show-app ul.vtexIdUI-providers-list .vtexIdUI-providers-btn{background:#bed02e;border:2px solid #bed02e!important;height:40px;border-radius:20px!important;box-shadow:none;overflow:hidden;text-shadow:none}.vtexIdUI-show-app ul.vtexIdUI-providers-list .vtexIdUI-providers-btn:hover{background-color:transparent!important}.vtexIdUI-show-app ul.vtexIdUI-providers-list .vtexIdUI-providers-btn p{color:#000}.vtexIdUI-show-app ul.vtexIdUI-providers-list .vtexIdUI-providers-btn p::before{content:'INGRESAR A HACEB'}.vtexIdUI-show-app ul.vtexIdUI-providers-list .vtexIdUI-providers-btn p span{display:none}</style><iframe name="_hjRemoteVarsFrame" title="_hjRemoteVarsFrame" id="_hjRemoteVarsFrame" src="https://vars.hotjar.com/box-a1ae2079824d1c48aa9ce06efb256f18.html" style="display: none !important;
